description: Retrieves details about a provider that can be used to connect an Amazon Web Services managed application or customer managed application to IAM Identity Center.

parameters.name: ApplicationProviderArn
parameters.description: Specifies the ARN of the application provider for which you want details.

nested_items.name: ApplicationProviderArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the application provider.

nested_items.name: FederationProtocol
nested_items.description: The protocol used to federate to the application provider.

nested_items.name: DisplayData
nested_items.description: A structure with details about the display data for the application provider.

nested_items.name: DisplayName
nested_items.description: The name of the application provider that appears in the portal.

nested_items.name: IconUrl
nested_items.description: A URL that points to an icon that represents the application provider.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the application provider that appears in the portal.

nested_items.name: ResourceServerConfig
nested_items.description: A structure with details about the receiving application.

nested_items.name: LongDescription
nested_items.description: The description of an access scope for a resource server.

nested_items.name: DetailedTitle
nested_items.description: The title of an access scope for a resource server.
